title: List data sources
description: Lists all supported data sources for the BigQuery Data Transfer Service.

objective.narrative: A developer needs to programmatically discover what types of data transfers are supported by the BigQuery Data Transfer Service. This sample lists all available data sources, which is a necessary first step before creating a transfer configuration.

regionTags.name: bigquerydatatransfer_v1_datatransferservice_datasources_list
regionTags.title: List data sources
regionTags.description: Lists all supported data sources for the BigQuery Data Transfer Service.
